-C.value: try { Use-Icinga; } catch { Write-Output 'The Icinga PowerShell Framework is either not installed on the system or not configured properly. Please check https://icinga.com/docs/windows for further details'; exit 3; }; Exit-IcingaPluginNotInstalled 'Invoke-IcingaCheckClusterNetwork'; exit Invoke-IcingaCheckClusterNetwork

2.description: Specify the name of the Network Interfaces you want to include for checks. Example 'Ethernet 1, Ethernet'
2.caption: IncludeClusterInterface

5.description:
Changes the behavior of the plugin output which check states are printed:
0 (default): Only services checks/packages with state not OK will be printed.
1: Only services with not OK will be printed including OK checks of affected check packages including Package config.
2: Everything will be printed regardless of the check state.
5.caption: Verbosity

4.description: Disables the performance data output of this plugin.
4.caption: NoPerfData

3.description: Specify the name of the Network Interfaces you want to exclude from checks. Example 'Ethernet 1, Ethernet'
3.caption: ExcludeClusterInterface
